verses.verse: And Abraham <WH85> journeyed <WH5265> from thence toward the land <WH776> of the South <WH5045>, and dwelt <WH3427> between Kadesh <WH6946> and Shur <WH7793>; and he sojourned <WH1481> in Gerar <WH1642>.

And Abraham <WH85> said <WH559> of <WH413> Sarah <WH8283> his wife <WH802>, She is my sister <WH269>: and Abimelech <WH40> king <WH4428> of Gerar <WH1642> sent <WH7971>, and took <WH3947> Sarah <WH8283>.

But God <WH430> came <WH935> to Abimelech <WH40> in a dream <WH2472> of the night <WH3915>, and said <WH559> to him <WH4191>, Behold, thou art but a dead man, because of the woman <WH802> whom thou hast taken <WH3947>; for she is a man <WH1167>'s wife <WH1166>.
Now Abimelech <WH40> had not come near <WH7126> her <WH559>: and he said, Lord <WH136>, wilt thou slay <WH2026> even a righteous <WH6662> nation <WH1471>?

Said <WH559> he not himself unto me <WH1931>, She is my sister <WH269>? and she <WH1931>, even <WH1571> she <WH1931> herself said <WH559>, He is my brother <WH251>: in the integrity <WH8537> of my heart <WH3824> and the innocency <WH5356> of my hands <WH3709> have I done this <WH6213>.

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto him in the dream <WH2472>, Yea <WH1571>, I know <WH3045> that in the integrity <WH8537> of thy heart <WH3824> thou has done <WH6213> this <WH2820>, and I also withheld thee from sinning <WH2398> against me <WH5414>: therefore suffered I thee not to touch her <WH5060>.

Now therefore restore <WH7725> the man <WH376>'s wife <WH802>; for he is a prophet <WH5030>, and he shall pray <WH6419> for thee <WH1157>, and thou shalt live <WH2421>: and if thou restore <WH7725> her not <WH3045>, know thou that thou shalt surely <WH4191> die <WH4191>, thou, and all that are thine.

And Abimelech <WH40> rose early <WH7925> in the morning <WH1242>, and called <WH7121> all his servants <WH5650>, and told <WH1696> all these things <WH1697> in their ears <WH241>: and the men <WH582> were sore <WH3966> afraid <WH3372>.

Then Abimelech <WH40> called <WH7121> Abraham <WH85>, and said <WH559> unto him <WH6213>, What hast thou done unto us <WH2398>? and wherein have I sinned against thee <WH935>, that thou hast brought on me and on my kingdom <WH4467> a great <WH1419> sin <WH2401>? thou hast done <WH6213> deeds <WH4639> unto me that ought not to be done <WH6213>.
And Abimelech <WH40> said <WH559> unto Abraham <WH85>, What <WH4100> sawest thou <WH7200>, that thou hast done <WH6213> this thing <WH1697>?

And Abraham <WH85> said <WH559>, Because I thought <WH559>, Surely <WH7535> the fear <WH3374> of God <WH430> is not in this place <WH4725>; and they will slay me <WH2026> for my wife <WH802>'s sake <WH1697>.
And moreover she is indeed <WH546> my sister <WH269>, the daughter <WH1323> of my father <WH1>, but not the daughter <WH1323> of my mother <WH517>; and she became my wife <WH802>:

and it came to pass <WH430>, when God caused me to wander <WH8582> from my father <WH1>'s house <WH1004>, that I said <WH559> unto her <WH2617>, This is thy kindness which thou shalt show <WH6213> unto me <WH4725>: at every place whither we shall come <WH935>, say <WH559> of me <WH251>, He is my brother.

And Abimelech <WH40> took <WH3947> sheep <WH6629> and oxen <WH1241>, and men-servants <WH5650> and women-servants <WH8198>, and gave <WH5414> them unto Abraham <WH85>, and restored <WH7725> him Sarah <WH8283> his wife <WH802>.
And Abimelech <WH40> said <WH559>, Behold <WH776>, my land is before thee <WH3427>: dwell where it pleaseth thee <WH2896>.

And unto Sarah <WH8283> he said <WH559>, Behold <WH5414>, I have given thy brother <WH251> a thousand <WH505> pieces of silver <WH3701>: behold <WH3682>, it is for thee a covering of the eyes <WH5869> to all that are with thee <WH3198>; and in respect of all thou art righted.
And Abraham <WH85> prayed <WH6419> unto God <WH430>: and God <WH430> healed <WH7495> Abimelech <WH40>, and his wife <WH802>, and his maid-servants <WH519>; and they bare children <WH3205>.
For Jehovah <WH3068> had fast <WH6113> closed up <WH6113> all the wombs <WH7358> of the house <WH1004> of Abimelech <WH40>, because <WH1697> of Sarah <WH8283>, Abraham <WH85>'s wife <WH802>.
